jobTitle: Electrical Repair - Fan and Light Installation
jobDescription: Need to install 2 ceiling fans and 4 LED lights in the living room and bedroom. Also need to check and repair some electrical switches that are not working properly.
specialInstructions: Please call before arriving. Building security requires visitor registration.
customerNotes: The main switch board is located in the kitchen. Some switches have been sparking, so please check them first for safety.
